name: UpdateSyncDocumentPermission
description: Update an identity's access to a specific Sync Document.

ServiceSid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Sync Service Instance.

DocumentSid.description: Identifier of the Sync Document. Either a SID or a unique name.

Identity.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.

Manage.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can delete the Sync Document.

Read.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can read the Sync Document.

Write.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can update the Sync Document.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Twilio Account.
**document_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Sync Document to which the Permission applies.
**identity**: Arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
**manage**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can delete the Sync Document.
**read**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can read the Sync Document.
**service_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Sync Service Instance.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Sync Document Permission.
**write**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can update the Sync Document.
